name: HAUNTSPITAL
description:
CONTROLS: WASD

Guess what, friendo. You’re being chased through an abandoned hospital by a vengeful ghost. If she catches you she’ll turn you into a totally dead person. That would be bad. You will have to traverse many rooms and she will move every time you do. Bump objects to move them in her way and search for keys. If you’re lucky, you might will find the exit and escape!
